instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2879 Runs extremely slow
threads.message:
i have a 820-2879 that runs extremely slow, i have removed everything except LCD and still the same
takes 15 mins to show folder logo without HDD, i can't get into ASA cause either its stuck or takes forever.

no liquid damage on board. and i dun think there is ME to clear for this model. any other ways to determine which sensor is causing issues or its something else?

threads.title: 820-2879 Runs extremely slow
threads.message:
You didn't say if fan spins to max; is the case?
Test with known good trackpad.

threads.title: 820-2879 Runs extremely slow
threads.message: Ah yes, Fan spins to max. will test out the trackpad and reply
